articles.title: Elon Musk launches AI chatbot 'Grok' — says it can outperform ChatGPT - Cointelegraph
articles.description: Elon Musk and his newly founded AI startup, xAI, have released “Grok” — an AI chatbot which isn’t afraid to answer “spicy” questions and has outperformed OpenAI’s first iteration of ChatGPT in several academic tests, the firm says.
articles.content:
Elon Musk and his artificial intelligence startup xAI have released Grok an AI chatbot which can supposedly outperform OpenAIs first iteration of ChatGPT in several academic tests.

articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried convicted, PayPal faces SEC subpoena, and other news: Hodler's Digest, Oct. 19 – Nov. 4 - Cointelegraph
articles.description: Sam Bankman-Fried is found guilty of fraud, other crimes; PayPal receives subpoena from the U.S. SEC, and Invesco Galaxy’s spot Bitcoin ETF joins DTCC website.
articles.content: Former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried was found guilty of all seven charges by a jury in his criminal trial in New York after about four hours of deliberation. He was convicted of two counts of wire fraud… [+7083 chars]
